name: Maududi
text: Alif. Lam. Ra'. These are the verses of the Book, and a Clear Qur'an.

name: Maududi
text: Soon will the time come when the unbelievers will wish they were Muslims.

name: Maududi
text: Leave them to eat and enjoy life and let false hopes amuse them. They will soon come to know.

name: Maududi
text: Whenever We destroyed a town, a definite term had previously been decreed for it.

name: Maududi
text: No people can outstrip the term for its destruction nor can it delay it.

name: Maududi
text: They say: "O you to whom the Admonition has been revealed, you are surely crazed.

name: Maududi
text: Why do you not bring down angels upon us if you are indeed truthful?"

name: Maududi
text: We do not send down the angels (in frivolity); and when We do send them down, We do so with Truth; then people are granted no respite.

name: Maududi
text: As for the Admonition, indeed it is We Who have revealed it and it is indeed We Who are its guardians.

name: Maududi
text: (O Muhammad), certainly We did send Messengers before you among the nations which have gone by.

name: Maududi
text: And whenever a Messenger came to them, they never failed to mock him.

name: Maududi
text: Even so We make a way for it (that is, the Admonition) in the hearts of the culprits (like a hot rod);

name: Maududi
text: they do not believe in it. This has been the wont of people of this kind from ancient times.

name: Maududi
text: If We were even to open for them a way to the heavens, and they could continually climb up to it in broad daylight,

name: Maududi
text: they would still have said: "Surely our eyes have been dazzled; rather, we have been enchanted."

name: Maududi
text: We have indeed set constellations in the heavens and have beautified them for the beholders,

name: Maududi
text: and have protected them against every accursed satan

name: Maududi
text: save him who may eavesdrop, and then a bright flame pursues him.

name: Maududi
text: As for the earth, We have stretched it out and have cast on it firm mountains, and have caused to grow in it everything well-measured.

name: Maududi
text: And We have provided sustenance for you on it and also for those of whom you are not the providers.

name: Maududi
text: There is nothing except that its treasuries are with Us and We do not send it down except in a known measure.

name: Maududi
text: We send fertilizing winds, and then cause rain to descend from the sky, providing you abundant water to drink even though you could not have stored it up for yourselves.

name: Maududi
text: It is indeed We Who grant life and cause death and it is We who shall be the sole Inheritors of all.

name: Maududi
text: Surely We know those of you who have passed before and those who will come later.

name: Maududi
text: Indeed your Lord will gather them all together. Surely He is All-Wise, All-Knowing.

name: Maududi
text: Surely We brought man into being out of dry ringing clay which was wrought from black mud,

name: Maududi
text: while We had brought the jinn into being before out of blazing fire.

name: Maududi
text: Recall when your Lord said to the angels: "I will indeed bring into being a human being out of dry ringing clay wrought from black mud.

name: Maududi
text: When I have completed shaping him and have breathed into him of My Spirit, then fall you down before him in prostration."

name: Maududi
text: So, the angels - all of them - fell down in prostration,

name: Maududi
text: except Iblis; he refused to join those who prostrated.

name: Maududi
text: The Lord inquired: "Iblis! What is the matter with you that you did not join those who prostrated?"

name: Maududi
text: He said: "It does not behove of me to prostrate myself before a human being whom You have created out of dry ringing clay wrought from black mud."

name: Maududi
text: The Lord said: "Then get out of here; you are rejected,

name: Maududi
text: and there shall be a curse upon you till the Day of Recompense."

name: Maududi
text: Iblis said: "My Lord! Grant me respite till the Day when they will be resurrected."

name: Maududi
text: Allah said: "For sure you are granted respite

name: Maududi
text: until the day of a known time."

name: Maududi
text: Iblis said: "My Lord! In the manner You led me to error, I will make things on earth seem attractive to them and lead all of them to error,

name: Maududi
text: except those of Your servants whom You have singled out for Yourself."

name: Maududi
text: Allah said: "Here is the path that leads straight to Me.

name: Maududi
text: Over My true servants you will be able to exercise no power, your power will be confined to the erring ones, those who choose to follow you.

name: Maududi
text: Surely Hell is the promised place for all of them."

name: Maududi
text: There are seven gates in it, and to each gate a portion of them has been allotted.

name: Maududi
text: As for the God-fearing, they shall be amid gardens and springs.

name: Maududi
text: They will be told: "Enter it in peace and security."

name: Maududi
text: And We shall purge their breasts of all traces of rancour; and they shall be seated on couches facing one another as brothers.

name: Maududi
text: They shall face no fatigue in it, nor shall they ever be driven out of it.

name: Maududi
text: (O Prophet), declare to My servants that I am indeed Ever Forgiving, Most Merciful.

name: Maududi
text: At the same time, My chastisement is highly painful.

name: Maududi
text: And tell them about Abraham's guests.

name: Maududi
text: When they came to Abraham they said: "Peace be upon you!" He replied: "Indeed we feel afraid of you."

name: Maududi
text: They said: "Do not feel afraid, for we give you the good news of a wise boy."

name: Maududi
text: Abraham said: "What, do you give me this tiding though old age has smitten me? Just consider what tiding do you give me!"

name: Maududi
text: They said: "The good tiding we give you is of truth. Do not, therefore, be of those who despair."

name: Maududi
text: Abraham said: "Who despairs of the Mercy of his Lord except the misguided?"

name: Maududi
text: He added: "What is your errand O sent ones?"

name: Maududi
text: They said: "Verily we have been sent to a guilty people

name: Maududi
text: excepting the household of Lot. We shall deliver all of them,

name: Maududi
text: except his wife (about whom Allah says that) We have decreed that she shall be among those who stay behind."

name: Maududi
text: So when the envoys came to the household of Lot,

name: Maududi
text: he said: "Surely you are an unknown folk."

name: Maududi
text: They said: "Nay, we have brought to you that concerning which they have been in doubt.

name: Maududi
text: We truly tell you that we have brought to you the Truth.

name: Maududi
text: So set out with your family in a watch of the night, and keep yourself behind them, and no one of you may turn around, and keep going ahead as you have been commanded."

name: Maududi
text: And We communicated to him the decree that by the morning those people will be totally destroyed.

name: Maududi
text: In the meantime the people of the city came to Lot rejoicing.

name: Maududi
text: He said: "These are my guests, so do not disgrace me.

name: Maududi
text: Have fear of Allah, and do not humiliate me."

name: Maududi
text: They replied: "Did we not forbid you again and again to extend hospitality to all and sundry?"

name: Maududi
text: Lot exclaimed in exasperation: "If you are bent on doing something, then here are my daughters."

name: Maududi
text: By your life, (O Prophet), they went about blindly stumbling in their intoxication.

name: Maududi
text: Then the mighty Blast caught them at sunrise,

name: Maududi
text: and turned the land upside down, and rained down stones of baked clay.

name: Maududi
text: There are great Signs in this for those endowed with intelligence.

name: Maududi
text: The place (where this occurred) lies along a known route.

name: Maududi
text: Verily there is a Sign in this for the believers.

name: Maududi
text: And the people of Aykah were also wrong-doers.

name: Maududi
text: So We chastised them. The desolate locations of both communities lie on a well-known highway.

name: Maududi
text: Surely the people of al-Hijr also rejected the Messengers, calling them liars.

name: Maududi
text: We also gave them Our Signs, yet they turned away from them.

name: Maududi
text: They used to hew out houses from the mountains and lived in security.

name: Maududi
text: Then the Blast caught them in the morning

name: Maududi
text: and whatever they had been earning proved of no avail.

name: Maududi
text: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that is in between them except with Truth. Surely the Hour will come. So, (O Muhammad), do graciously overlook them (despite their misdeeds).

name: Maududi
text: Your Lord is indeed the Creator of all, the All-Knowing.

name: Maududi
text: We have indeed bestowed on you the seven oft-repeated verses and the Great Qur'an.

name: Maududi
text: Do not even cast your eyes towards the worldly goods We have granted to different kinds of people, nor grieve over the state they are in, but turn your loving attention to the believers instead,

name: Maududi
text: and clearly tell the unbelievers: "I am most certainly a plain warner,"

name: Maududi
text: even as We had sent warning to those who had divided their religion into fragments;

name: Maududi
text: those who had split up their Qur'an into pieces.

name: Maududi
text: By your Lord, We will question them all

name: Maududi
text: concerning what they have been doing.

name: Maududi
text: (O Prophet), proclaim what you are commanded, and pay no heed to those who associate others with Allah in His Divinity.

name: Maududi
text: Surely We suffice to deal with those who scoff at you,

name: Maududi
text: those who set up another deity alongside Allah. They shall soon come to know.

name: Maududi
text: We certainly know that their statements sorely grieve you.

name: Maududi
text: When (you feel so) glorify your Lord with His praise and prostrate yourself before Him,

name: Maududi
text: and worship your Lord until the last moment (of your life) that will most certainly come.
